name: skidlocked
description:
Skidlocked is a game about biking through traffic very fast. Dodge cars and run traffic lights, but don't get hit!

Features
  • Around 1 hour of gameplay
  • A free-roaming city with traffic simulation
  • 6 different missions throughout the city
  • Post-game with randomly generated races
  • Beat your own high-scores
  • Get hit by cars!


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
